prefuse.util.ui
Class JFastLabel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              prefuse.util.ui.JFastLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class JFastLabel
extends javax.swing.JComponent

Swing component that acts much like a JLabel, but does not revalidate its bounds when updated, making it much faster but suitable only for use in situations where the initial bounds are sufficient.

Author:
jeffrey heer
See Also:
Serialized Form

Get the quality level of this label. High quality results in anti-aliased rendering.

Returns:
